original: dang po ni snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i sa bon ts'um las rnam par 'phros pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs pa las nges par grub pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du bltas la /

translated: First, from the seed syllable CŪM in the center of the moon at the heart, light rays radiate in various ways, and one sees the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas definitely accomplished from those light rays in front.

original: mchod pa la sogs pa rnams bya ste /
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs pa rnams bya ste /
translated: One should make offerings and so forth to them.

analyzed: aom rdo rje'i me tog h'um bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis so//
translated: With the mantra Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ and so forth.

original: @12b de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: @12b de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should recite the verse of going for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: de'i rjes thogs la stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs la stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom par bya zhing /
translated: After that, one should meditate on emptiness.

analyzed: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no //🔽zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: One should say, “I am the nature of the vajra of the gnosis of emptiness.”

original: de nas tsum las nges par grub pa'i tsunda ste /
analyzed: de nas tsum las nges par grub pa'i tsunda ste /
translated: Then, from cuṃ, is the definitely accomplished Cundā.

original: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od zer dang mtshungs ma /
analyzed: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od zer dang mtshungs ma /
translated: She is like the light rays of the autumn moon.

original: phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: phyag bzhi ma /
translated: She has four arms.

original: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: g-yas pas ni mchog sbyin pa /
analyzed: g-yas pas ni mchog sbyin pa /
translated: With the right [hand] she gives the boon.

original: g-yon pas ni po ti dang bcas pa'i padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon pas ni po ti dang bcas pa'i padma bsnams pa /
translated: With the left [hand] she holds a lotus with a book.

original: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis ni lhung bzed bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis ni lhung bzed bsnams pa'o //
translated: The remaining two hands hold a begging bowl.

original: padma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bsgoms la /
analyzed: padma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bsgoms la /
translated: Meditate on her sitting in the vajra posture on a lotus and moon.

original: phyi nas ni phyag rgya snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / smin mtshams dang / spyi bo rnams su reg pas srung ba byas la bzlas pa bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nas ni phyag rgya snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / smin mtshams dang / spyi bo rnams su reg pas srung ba byas la bzlas pa bya ba'o //
translated: Then, having made protection by touching the heart, throat, forehead, and crown with the seal, one should do the recitation.

original: aom tsa le tsu le tsun de sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom tsa le tsu le tsun de sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ cale cule cuṇḍe svāhā.

original: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: The seal for that is as follows.

original: lag pa gnyis kyis snyim pa byas la mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis dbus su gzhong bu'i rnam pa lta bur byas pa la glor mthe bong gnyis kyis sbyar bas gnas pa'o //

translated: Make a hollow space in the middle of the two index fingers and two middle fingers, like a bowl, and join the two thumbs to the sides.

original: skul byed ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: skul byed ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Cāmuṇḍā is complete.
